short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You won't ever have to see adopt me again!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension doesn't allow the user to access the page adopt me. If you try and access it  then it will put you back to the main page. Adopt me killer also gets rid of adopt me from the discover page, friend page and home page. No more adopt me again!
